title: Issue applying for PBE
body:
Hello,

Whenever I try to sign up VIA the pbesignups (http://siglerdev.us/photoupload/2017_01_16_19_44_40.png) subdomain for PBE, I constantly get this error. When I click the button at the bottom that states "I want to help" it stalls and eventually takes me to an error page (http://siglerdev.us/photoupload/2017_01_16_19_38_31.png). Does this occur for anyone else as I would like to try and signup for PBE access.

Thank you!

replies.body: Unfortunately, the images don't show up anything for me.  What is the error you're getting exactly, if you can describe it to me?  Let me know!

Sorry, not sure what happened to the image. Heres another, maybe it will work. http://siglerdev.us/photoupload/2017_01_17_15_08_47.png

And the image is of iBlitzcrank that says "Error: 500 Something's gone hextechnically wrong. Maintenance golems are working to exterminate the problem."

Thanks for the follow up!  We've received a few reports on this and want to investigate further.  Grab this screenshot and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
